metadata.title: CVE-2024-49922 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/amd/display: Check null pointers before using them  [WHAT & HOW] These pointers are null checked previously in the same function, indicating they might be null as reported by Coverity. As a result, they need to be checked when used again.  This fixes 3 FORWARD_NULL issue reported by Coverity.
